definition: Beijing National Aquatics Center, swimming venue of the Beijing 2008 Olympic Games
pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Guo2 jia1 You2 yong3 Zhong1 xin1

definition: swim ring/swim tube/(fig.) (coll.) spare tire (roll of fat around the waist)

sentences.english: This platform can be pulled up when deciding to go for a swim.
sentences.chinese: 这个平台在决定去游泳时还可以收缩起来。

sentences.english: I want to daydream about have a big house with a big swimming pool and hurst motte wood.
sentences.chinese: 我想有一个很大的房子和很大的游泳池，树林。

sentences.english: Swimming is Hong Kong's most popular summer pastime.
sentences.chinese: 游泳是香港人最喜爱的夏日康乐活动。

sentences.english: Brand new wide sliding door leads you to the cozy back yard with pool and fruit trees.
sentences.chinese: 全新的大滑门带你到后院的舒适游泳池，还有果树。

sentences.english: The right style of swimsuit can help by hiding bulges .
sentences.chinese: 款式适当的游泳衣有助于掩饰肥胖部位。

sentences.english: He boasted that he was the best swimmer in the city.
sentences.chinese: 他夸口说他是本市最优秀的游泳者。

sentences.english: The first edition of the Yi Quan Lake Winter Swim Cultural Festival took place on January 16.
sentences.chinese: 这是于1月16号举办的首届溢泉湖冬季游泳文化节。

sentences.english: They should take to swimming like, er, a duck to water.
sentences.chinese: 呃，它们本应该像鸭子一般在水里游泳。

sentences.english: I usually swim with my father. Sometimes I eat ice-cream at home.
sentences.chinese: 我通常和我的父亲去游泳，有时在家吃冰激淋。

sentences.english: All sharks sink unless they swim.
sentences.chinese: 所有的鲨鱼在不游泳时都会沉下来。

sentences.english: South SaFengMei rugh in the life to come to Mimi home swim party.
sentences.chinese: 卢伊萨奉梅南之命来咪咪家参与游泳派对。

sentences.english: Swimming A Fort Lauderdale swimmer releases the air in his lungs underwater.
sentences.chinese: 劳德戴尔堡垒游泳者在水下面释放他肺中的空气。

sentences.english: I often swam across the river.
Swim in the ocean. Plant a garden.
sentences.chinese: 在大海里面游泳，建一个花园。

sentences.english: Neither the Concorde nor the Napoléon has a swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 协和和拿破仑饭店都没有游泳池。

sentences.english: Exspecially the swimming pool, how can it be so relaxing?
sentences.chinese: 特别是这个游泳池，气氛怎么可以这么放松呢？

definition: to dive/to go under water/(in an online forum) to lurk
to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
